info.name: VidBit Night Mode
info.description: Makes VidBit.co a bit easier on your eyes. Best for use when it's not pitch black but maybe a small lamp halfway across the room is on or something. It makes it more gray.
info.additionalInfo:
Wooh! First public vidbit theme I think!

Changlelog:

V 0.1: Doesn't change as much as I would like but definitely helps.

V 0.3: Changed channels and video watch pages. (/channels and /watch?v=)

V 0.5: Current version. Changed the videos page and the community page. (/community and /videos)
